author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO STRENGTHEN INTO A TROPICAL STORM BY TONIGHT...
summary: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO STRENGTHEN INTO A TROPICAL STORM BY TONIGHT... As of 5:00 AM HST Mon Aug 04 the center of Eight-E was located near 14.2, -119.9 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO STRENGTHEN INTO A TROPICAL STORM BY TONIGHT... As of 5:00 AM HST Mon Aug 04 the center of Eight-E was located near 14.2, -119.9 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Eight-E (EP3/EP082025)
